posts.post_content:
Looking for cards etc of Blackstone who played for Greenville.

I know there's a T209-2 and a T210. 

I'd also be interested in other stuff, like Greenville team pics from 1909- 1912 

He also played part of 1912 and 1913 for Petersburg in the Virginia League.

Or whatever I haven't thought of.

Condition isn't a big thing, but a decently clear image is best. 


Steve B
Hi Steve, found team photos of Ellison Blackstone on eBay, had several most were pretty clear.

If they're the ones I've seen they're pages from I think the Spaulding guide. I've been avoiding them because I'm not keen on cutting up the guides. I'll probably pick one up sometime. I'd been hoping to find a copy of the original picture the guides used. 
On the plus side, Joe Jackson had moved up by the time Ellis started, so I have a chance at affording a photo if one comes up.
